UNITED STATES                 
                                              
      SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION      
                                              
            Washington, D.C. 20549            
                   FORM 6-K                   
                                              
       Report of Foreign Private Issuer       
                                              
   Pursuant to Rule 13a-16 or 15d-16 under    
                                              
     the Securities Exchange Act of 1934      
                                              
  For the month of       Commission File      
  March 2025             Number: 1-14678      
                                              
      CANADIAN IMPERIAL BANK OF COMMERCE      
                                              
    (Translation of registrant’s name into    
                   English)                   
                                              
          CIBC Square, 81 Bay Street          
                                              
               Toronto, Ontario               
                                              
                Canada M5J 0E7                
                                              
   (Address of principal executive offices)   
Indicate by check mark whether the registrant
files or will
file annual reports under cover of Form 20-F
or Form 40-F:
                                 
  Form 20-F   ☐    Form 40-F  ☑  
                                 
                  SIGNATURES                  
Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly
caused this report to be signed on its behalf
by the undersigned, thereunto duly authorized.
                                              
                            CANADIAN          
                            IMPERIAL BANK OF  
                            COMMERCE          
  Date: March               /s/ Allison       
  13, 2025          By:     Mudge             
 ──────────────────────────────────────────── 
                    Name:   Allison Mudge     
                    Title:  Senior            
                            Vice-President    
                                              
                   Exhibits                   
                                              
              Description                     
              News                            
              Release Dated March 13, 2025 -  
              CIBC President and CEO Victor   
              Dodig Announces Plan to Retire  
              October 31,                     
              2025; Harry Culham Appointed    
              Chief Operating Officer         
              effective April 1, 2025 and     
              Named to Succeed Dodig as CIBC  
  Exhibits    President and CEO November      
  99.1        1, 2025                         
 ────────────────────────────────────────────
